sentences.english: In some European countries a huge amount of goods shipped between the inland waterway transport.
sentences.chinese: 在一些歐洲國家間裝運巨量貨物的內河運輸。

sentences.english: This term can only be used for sea or inland waterway transportation.
sentences.chinese: 本術語僅用於海運或內河運輸。

sentences.english: The Beidaihe inland water transportation is extremely developed, it is interlinked with the Beijing-Hangzhou Canal.
sentences.chinese: 北戴河內河運輸十分發達，與京杭大運河相通。

sentences.english: This term can only be used for sea or inland waterway.
sentences.chinese: 該術語只能用於海運或內河運輸。

sentences.english: Clear river transport plays an important role in the municipal development.
sentences.chinese: 河運通暢是城市發展的重要因素。

sentences.english: Delays on the river are declining partly due to less traffic.
sentences.chinese: 河運延誤的情況在一定程度上因運輸量下降而減少。

sentences.english: FOB term can be used only for sea or inland waterway transport.
sentences.chinese: 即FOB條款只適用於海運或者是內河運輸。

sentences.english: This term can be used only for sea and inland waterway transport.
sentences.chinese: 該術語僅適用於海運和內河運輸。

sentences.english: The freshwater transportation occupies an important position in the province and trunk railways radiates in all directions.
sentences.chinese: 內河運輸在省內居重要地位，鐵路幹線四通八達。

sentences.english: In Serbia, all river transport is suspended on the Danube.
sentences.chinese: 在塞爾維亞，多瑙河上所有的河運暫停運行。

sentences.english: During this time barge traffic will find relief repositioning fleets.
sentences.chinese: 這段時間內，駁船運輸將重新整合以緩解河運壓力。
